headline: The Bull Case For Marriott (MAR) Could Change Following Launch of Series Brand in Five Key US Cities
summary: Marriott International and Hawkins Way Capital have completed agreements to convert five FOUND Hotels properties in Miami, Santa Monica, San Francisco, Chicago, and San Diego to the new Series by Marriott brand, marking its U.S. debut. This move not only expands Marriott’s regional presence but also integrates the hotels into Marriott Bonvoy, enhancing loyalty program reach while retaining FOUND’s independent identity. We’ll explore how the Series by Marriott expansion into key U.S. markets...

headline: Marriott signs agreements to launch Series hotel brand in US
summary: The transition of five hotels to the Marriott brand is scheduled to take place over the next year.

headline: Series by Marriott enters US amid demand for upscale collection brands
summary: Marriott brings the newly launched brand stateside with five signings, and discussions for more in the region are underway, per global development officer Noah Silverman.

headline: 3 Unpopular Stocks We Keep Off Our Radar
summary: Wall Street’s bearish price targets for the stocks in this article signal serious concerns. Such forecasts are uncommon in an industry where maintaining cordial corporate relationships often trumps delivering the hard truth.
